title: RideData Viewer
description: A dashboard that fetches Peloton ride data using a middleware API hosted on Render. It visualizes speed, cadence, and heart rate over time with Chart.js. Built to practice third-party auth and API integrations.

title: React Mini Game
description: This project explores game logic in React, highlighting how React hooks simplify state management and enhance user interactivity, making it ideal for learning in a relaxed, non-work setting.
